Text:
This makes 7 digital versions I now have but to my ears with my HIFI the Discovery Box Set released last year still sounds best.  You can listen to it here:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6716562/PINK_FLOYD_Discovery_Studio_Album_Box_Set_(2011)_FLAC

Now the vinyl is a completely different story though....

Thanks!... keep 'em coming

@ rjordan21 Thanks for the link, i'll give them a listen.

Out of curiosity, what is your opinion of the quadraphonic mix? I'm thinking of purchasing it.

I'd give it a listen only if you've got the equipment to properly listen to it.  I have no interest though.  I've never listened to any live band or orchestra where they've placed speakers behind the audience...
